citation.case_name: In Re Discipline of Goodman. No. D-2394

html:
543 U.S. 1046

IN RE DISCIPLINE OF GOODMAN.
No. D-2394.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 10, 2005.

1

Ellis Howard Goodman, of Baltimore, Md., is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
